title: Fade Factory Website
description: Bold, dark website with online booking and gallery showcase
challenge: Need to stand out in crowded market and drive online bookings
approach: Created immersive, dark aesthetic matching shop vibe with seamless booking flow
result: 40% increase in online bookings, 3x longer average session time

title: Origins Coffee E-commerce
description: Moody e-commerce site for specialty coffee roaster
challenge: Translate in-person roastery experience to online store
approach: Dark, tactile design with storytelling for each coffee origin
result: 250% increase in online sales within 3 months

title: Built Different Portfolio
description: Portfolio site showcasing major construction projects
challenge: Compete for commercial contracts against established firms
approach: Industrial aesthetic with detailed case studies proving expertise
result: Landed 2 major contracts within first month of launch

title: Underground Collective Hub
description: Event platform and artist showcase for music collective
challenge: Centralize event promotion and ticket sales for multiple venues
approach: Dark, immersive design with streamlined ticket purchasing
result: Unified brand presence, 60% increase in advance ticket sales
